column2: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column3: NAT (Network Address Translation) ermöglicht mehreren Nutzern, gleichzeitig auf das Internet über eine oder mehrere öffentliche IP-Adressen zuzugreifen. Außerdem kann NAT Hacker-Angriffe verhindern, indem lokale IP-Adressen auf öffentliche Adressen umgewandelt werden.
column4: NAT (Network Address Translation) ile, birden fazla kullanıcının bir veya birden fazla genel IP adresi üzerinden aynı zamanda internete erişmesi mümkündür. NAT ayrıca, yerel IP adresleri genel adreslere dönüştürerek hacker saldırılarını engelleyebilir.
column5: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column6: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column7: Network Address translation (NAT) permite a varios usuarios de su red local acceder a Internet a través de una única dirección IP pública o varias direcciones IP públicas. NAT también puede prevenir ataques de hackers mediante la asignación de las direcciones locales a direcciones públicas para los servicios clave, tales como la Web o FTP.
column8: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column10: NAT (Network Address Translation) ermöglicht mehreren Nutzern, gleichzeitig auf das Internet über eine oder mehrere öffentliche IP-Adressen zuzugreifen. Außerdem kann NAT Hacker-Angriffe verhindern, indem lokale IP-Adressen auf öffentliche Adressen umgewandelt werden.
column11: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column12: NAT (Network Address Translation) ile, birden fazla kullanıcının bir veya birden fazla genel IP adresi üzerinden aynı zamanda internete erişmesi mümkündür. NAT ayrıca, yerel IP adresleri genel adreslere dönüştürerek hacker saldırılarını engelleyebilir.
column13: NAT (Network Address Translation) ermöglicht mehreren Nutzern, gleichzeitig auf das Internet über eine oder mehrere öffentliche IP-Adressen zuzugreifen. Außerdem kann NAT Hacker-Angriffe verhindern, indem lokale IP-Adressen auf öffentliche Adressen umgewandelt werden.
column14: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.
column15: Network Address Translation (NAT) allows multiple users at your local site to access the Internet through a single public IP address or multiple public IP addresses. NAT can also prevent hacker attacks by mapping local addresses to public addresses for key services such as the Web or FTP.

column2: If you have a local client PC that cannot run an Internet application properly from behind the NAT firewall, you can open the client to unrestricted two-way Internet access by defining a Virtual Exposed Host.
column3: Wenn Sie einen lokalen PC haben, der eine Internetanwendung nicht fehlerfrei hinter einer NAT Firewall durchführen kann, haben Sie die Möglichkeit, diesem PC einen unbeschränkten Zugang zum Internet via Virtuellem Exposed Host zu erlauben.
column4: Eğer bir NAT Firewall'un arkasında bir internet uygulamasını hatasız şekilde gerçekleştiremeyen yerel bilgisarayiniz varsa, bu biglisaraya sanal Exposed Host üzerinden kısıtlamasız internet erişimi izni verme imkanına sahipsiniz.
column5: If you have a local client PC that cannot run an Internet application properly from behind the NAT firewall, you can open the client to unrestricted two-way Internet access by defining a Virtual Exposed Host.
column6: If you have a local client PC that cannot run an Internet application properly from behind the NAT firewall, you can open the client to unrestricted two-way Internet access by defining a Virtual Exposed Host.
column7: Si tiene un cliente local que no puede ejecutar una aplicación de Internet correctamente detrás del firewall NAT, puede habilitar el acceso sin restricciones activando el DMZ
column8: If you have a local client PC that cannot run an Internet application properly from behind the NAT firewall, you can open the client to unrestricted two-way Internet access by defining a Virtual Exposed Host.
column10: Wenn Sie eine Internetanwendung haben, die nicht fehlerfrei hinter einer Firewall funktioniert, haben Sie hier die Möglichkeit, einem Gerät im Heimnetzwerk einen unbeschränkten Zugang zum Internet zu erlauben (Exposed Host).
column11: If you have a local network device that cannot run an Internet application properly behind the firewall, you can allow unrestricted Internet access to the network device (Exposed Host).
column12: Eğer bir NAT Firewall'un arkasında bir internet uygulamasını hatasız şekilde gerçekleştiremeyen yerel PC'niz varsa, bu PC'ye sanal Exposed Host üzerinden kısıtlamasız internet erişimi izni verme imkanına sahipsiniz.
column13: Wenn Sie eine Internetanwendung haben, die nicht fehlerfrei hinter einer Firewall funktioniert, haben Sie hier die Möglichkeit, einem Gerät im Heimnetzwerk einen unbeschränkten Zugang zum Internet zu erlauben (Exposed Host).
column14: If you have a local network device that cannot run an Internet application properly behind the firewall, you can allow unrestricted Internet access to the network device (Exposed Host).
column15: If you have a local network device that cannot run an Internet application properly behind the firewall, you can allow unrestricted Internet access to the network device (Exposed Host).

column2: One PC can be exposed to the Internet for two-way communications e.g. Internet gaming, video conferencing, or VPN connections. To use the Exposed Host, you must set a static IP address for that PC.
column3: Ein PC kann als Exposed Host freigeschaltet werden, dazu müssen Sie hier eine statische IP-Adresse zuweisen.
column4: Bir bilgisarayin Exposed Host olarak onaylanması mümkündür. Bunun için burada bir statik IP adresi tayin etmeniz gerekmektedir.
column5: One PC can be exposed to the Internet for two-way communications e.g. Internet gaming, video conferencing, or VPN connections. To use the Exposed Host, you must set a static IP address for that PC.
column6: One PC can be exposed to the Internet for two-way communications e.g. Internet gaming, video conferencing, or VPN connections. To use the Exposed Host, you must set a static IP address for that PC.
column7: Un PC puede ser expuesto a Internet para comunicaciones bidireccionales, por ejemplo, Juegos en Internet, videoconferencia, o VPN. Para utilizarlo debe configurar una dirección IP estática para ese PC.
column8: One PC can be exposed to the Internet for two-way communications e.g. Internet gaming, video conferencing, or VPN connections. To use the Exposed Host, you must set a static IP address for that PC.
column10: Wählen Sie hier die lokale IP-Adresse aus, die unbeschränkten Zugang zum Internet erhalten soll. Zusätzlich sollten Sie diese IP-Adresse als statische DHCP-Adresse für Ihr Gerät im Heimnetzwerk konfigurieren (unter Einstellungen/Netzwerk).
column11: Choose the local IP address that should be exposed to Internet. Additionally you should configure this IP address as static DHCP address for your device (see Settings/Network).
column12: Bir PC'nin Exposed Host olarak onaylanması mümkündür. Bunun için burada (sayfa Ayarlar/Network) bir statik IP adresi tayin etmeniz gerekmektedir.
column13: Wählen Sie hier die lokale IP-Adresse aus, die unbeschränkten Zugang zum Internet erhalten soll. Zusätzlich sollten Sie diese IP-Adresse als statische DHCP-Adresse für Ihr Gerät im Heimnetzwerk konfigurieren (unter Einstellungen/Netzwerk).
column14: Choose the local IP address that should be exposed to Internet. Additionally you should configure this IP address as static DHCP address for your device (see Settings/Network).
column15: One PC can be exposed for two-way communication reachable from the public internet e.g. server applications. To use the exposed host, you must set a static IP address for that PC, an IP address on the PlusBox (Gateway) and an IP subnet mask.

column2:
Warning: By using the exposed host function you bypass the firewall of EasyBox. Please make sure that your computer is protected against attacks from internet.
The following ports will not be forwarded: %s.
column3:

column2: DDNS allows you to access your EasyBox from the Internet using a domain name instead of IP address. You will need an account on a DDNS service provider.
column3: DDNS ermöglicht Ihnen, Ihre EasyBox aus dem Internet über einen Domänen-Namen statt über die IP-Adresse zu erreichen. Sie benötigen hierzu einen Account eines DDNS-Anbieters.
column4: DynDNS, domain ismini bilgisayarlara veya sunuculara ilişkilendirmenize imkan sağlar. DynDNS, IP adresiniz değiştiğinde DNS kaydınızı da değiştirerek domain isminin otomatik olarak IP adresine göre uyarlanmasını sağlar.

column2:
Remote management allows you to configure the EasyBox over the internet. For safety reasons, the Remote Management via an encrypted connection (https). It is protected by a separate password.
Is particularly convenient for remote management in connection with a DDNS account.
column3:
Die Fernverwaltung erlaubt Ihnen, die EasyBox auch über das Internet zu konfigurieren. Aus Sicherheitsgründen erfolgt die Fernverwaltung über eine verschlüsselte Verbindung (https). Sie ist mit einem separaten Kennwort geschützt.
Besonders komfortabel wird die Fernverwaltung in Verbindung mit einem DDNS-Account.
column4: EasyBox´unuzu uzaktan yönetimini yapılandırabilirsiniz. Eğer EasyBox´unuz yerel ağın dışındaki bir PC'den yönetebilmek istiyorsanız, bu PC'nin IP adresini de buraya girmek zorundasınız.

column2:
Using a VPN it is possible to secuerly connect a computer via internet to your home network. On EasyBox the OpenVPN protocol is used. Using a DDNS account it is very easy to establish the VPN connection.
Expert knowledge is required to configure and setup a VPN.
column3:
Ein VPN erlaubt es Ihnen, Computer über das Internet mit Ihrem Heimnetz zu verbinden und verschlüsselt zu kommunizieren. Die EasyBox verwendet hierzu das OpenVPN-Protokoll. Besonders komfortabel lässt sich eine VPN-Verbindung herstellen, wenn Sie einen DDNS-Account konfiguriert haben.
Um die VPN-Funktion zu nutzen, benötigen Sie fundierte Netzwerk- und VPN-Kenntnisse.
column4:
Bir VPN ile, bir ağ içindeki katılımcılar başka bir ağ ile bağlantı kurulabirilir. EasyBox OpenVPN protokol kullanır. Bir DDNS hesabı ile rahat bir VPN bağlantısı kurabilirsiniz.
VPN yapılandırma ve kurulum için uzman bilgisi gereklidir.
column5:
Using a VPN it is possible to secuerly connect a computer via internet to your home network. On EasyBox the OpenVPN protocol is used. Using a DDNS account it is very easy to establish the VPN connection.
Expert knowledge is required to configure and setup a VPN.
column6:
Using a VPN it is possible to secuerly connect a computer via internet to your home network. On the router the OpenVPN protocol is used. Using a DDNS account it is very easy to establish the VPN connection.
Expert knowledge is required to configure and setup a VPN.
column7:
Usando una VPN es posible conectar con seguridad un ordenador a través de Internet a su red doméstica. En el router se utiliza el protocolo OpenVPN. Usando una cuenta DDNS es muy fácil establecer la conexión VPN.
Se requiere conocimiento experto para configurar una VPN.

column6:
